DataElement.preferredName: Nausea Vomiting Risk Factor History of Other Difficulty with Nausea and/or Vomiting Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated indication of whether or not they have a history of other difficulties with nausea and/or vomiting.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Nausea Vomiting Risk Factor History of Other Difficulty with Nausea and/or Vomiting
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The sensation that one is about to vomit._The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth._Anything that increases a person's chance of developing a disease. Some examples of risk factors for cancer include a family history of cancer, use of tobacco products, certain foods, exposure to radiation or cancer-causing agents, and certain genetic alterations._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._The sensation that one is about to vomit._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The sensation that one is about to vomit.:The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth.:Anything that increases a person's chance of developing a disease. Some examples of risk factors for cancer include a family history of cancer, use of tobacco products, certain foods, exposure to radiation or cancer-causing agents, and certain genetic alterations.

Concepts.definition: Upper abdominal discomfort associated with an urge to vomit.
Forceful ejection of the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
Any aspect of an individual's life, behavior, an environmental exposure, or an inborn or inherited characteristic that increases the likelihood of a disease, condition or injury.

Property.preferredName: Personal Medical History Other Difficulty With Nausea And/Or Vomiting
Property.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.:Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:The sensation that one is about to vomit.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
Upper abdominal discomfort associated with an urge to vomit.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
Forceful ejection of the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
